attributes.additional_details:
Think it speaks for itself

The country isn’t ordered and civilised like it once was.

Would be an excellent deterrent to young thugs carrying knives too… if they’re realised our government isn’t playing any more.
attributes.background:
Not pay to keep child murderers alive and taking up space in prison forever.

If they’re 100% guilty, execute them.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Abolish whole life orders and reintroduce the death penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623
